name: ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier & Conditional Shipping
author: ReachShip, ELEXtensions

sections.description:
Introducing the ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier Shipping Plugin! Access real-time shipping rates, print shipping labels, schedule pickups, generate bulk labels, create commercial invoices, use scan forms, track live shipments, and much more‚Äîall for free to start. This plugin supports leading carriers like DHL Express and Australia Post, with USPS, UPS, and FedEx coming soon.

üëâ Official Free Demo Link: ReachShip Plugin Exclusive Live Demo

üëâ Any queries? Contact Support

With our plugin‚Äôs advanced packaging algorithm, items added to the cart will be intelligently packed into the most suitable boxes based on their dimensions. These boxes can be pre-configured to ensure optimal utilization of space. As a result, your shipping rates will be accurately calculated, taking into account the actual volume occupied by the items. Say goodbye to inefficient packing and hello to cost-effective shipping.

In addition, WooCommerce Conditional Shipping / Table Rate Shipping feature helps you to set up your flat rate shipping based on rules & conditions. These rules can be defined on multiple parameters like item, shipping class, cart value, product category, destination address, etc.

The plugin uses ReachShip Multi-Carrier Shipping API to integrate with various Shipping Carriers. With our plugin, you can streamline the creation of shipping labels and display tracking history to WooCommerce admins and customers. You can also automatically email shipment status updates to your customers.

Top Features of ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier Shipping Plugin

  • Show Real-time Shipping Rates along with Estimated Delivery Date to Your WooCommerce Store Customers.
  • Advanced Parcel Packaging Options – Pack into boxes with weights and dimensions, Pack items based on weight.
  • Print Shipping Labels from WooCommerce Order Admin Page.
  • Schedule Pickup from WooCommerce Order Admin Page.
  • Shipment Tracking with Detailed Transit information within WooCommerce.
  • Option to enable Automatic Label Generation, which auto generates labels immediately after order creation.
  • Option to Add Multiple Accounts for a Carrier.
  • Option to Add Multiple addresses & associate them with Carrier Accounts.
  • Advanced Automated Packing using Box Packing & Weight-based Packing.[Coming Soon]
  • Return Labels.
  • Bulk Operations for Shipment Creation, Pickup Scheduling, etc.
  • Intuitive Dashboard for Reports & Analytics.
  • Conditional Shipping | Table Rate Shipping. [More Details Given Below]
  • Backed with excellent premium support.

Top Features of ReachShip WooCommerce Conditional Table Rate Shipping

Plugin comes with Table Rate Conditional Shipping functionality, which independently works with no API dependencies. You can configure various conditions/rules to set flat shipping rates or shipping carriers / services based on

  • Item / Product added to the Cart
  • Product Category of the items in the cart
  • Total Cart Value of the items in the cart
  • Shipping Class
  • Shipping Destination Address – Country, State & Zip Code

Shipping Carrier Integrations with WooCommerce

The Plugin Supports both Domestic and International Shipping Carrier Services.
* DHL Express
* Australia Post – MyPost
* Australia Post – StarTrack
* Australia Post – eParcel
* USPS – United States Postal Service [Coming Soon]
* UPS – United Parcel Service [Coming Soon]
* FedEx [Coming Soon]

For More Information

For details on Best WooCommerce Shipping Plugins we have developed, visit the page listing Shipping Carrers Integrations for WooCommerce.
For the detailed list of Free ReachShip Plugin features and details, please visit ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier & Conditional Shipping Product Page.

Contact Us

For Support / Pre-Sales / Post-Sales questions, contact us through ELEXtensions Support

Tutorial / Manual

For the detailed documentation on ReachShip, visit ReachShip Knowledge Base Section.
For the detailed documentation of ReachShip API, visit ReachShip API Documentation Section.

About ELEXtensions

The Team ELEXtensions, are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce that cater to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support. Our premium extensions are designed to help you manage your store more efficiently and effectively. With our extensions, you can easily manage your shipments, pricing, payments and customer support all in one place. Both ReachShip and ELEXtensions are brands owned by legally registered company Elula Tech Private Limited.

About ReachShip

ReachShip is a SaaS-based Multi-Carrier Shipping API platform crafted by Team ELEXtensions, that helps businesses create and manage shipments by integrating the best shipping options suitable for their business and shipments to their e-commerce store. With a focus on performance, ReachShip provides APIs to obtain shipping rates, print shipping labels, schedule pickups, track shipments, get flat rate boxes, delete shipments, and more. It also suggests packaging options as well as print shipping labels. ReachShip APIs are integrated with multiple leading Shipping Carriers and are committed to incorporating more shipping carriers in the coming future.

Shipping Carriers Supported by ReachShip API

The list of Supported Shipping Carriers by ReachShip API.

  • DHL Express
  • Australia Post – MyPost Business
  • Australia Post – StarTrack
  • Australia Post – eParcel
  • USPS – Stamps.com [Coming Soon]
  • USPS eVS [Coming Soon]
  • UPS [Coming Soon]
  • FedEx [Coming Soon]
  • Sendle [Coming Soon]
sections.installation:
1. Add a new plugin on the wordpress plugins section and choose the plugin. Or unzip the downloaded plugin zip and Upload it to the folder ‚Äò/wp-content/plugins/‚Äô.

  2. Activate the plugin.

  3. That’s it ‚Äì you can now configure the plugin by going to the settings section.
sections.faq:
After the setup, my site is still saying ‚ÄúThere doesn‚Äòt seem to be any available shipping methods‚Äù.

You can enable debug in settings and debug messages, from which you will get a clue what is the issue about. Still having trouble? Please contact our Support ! We are happy to help.

What are the domestic and international services supported as part of Each of these shipping carrier integration?

The plugin normally supports all the latest international services provided by these Carriers. Contact our Support for any further clarifications.
sections.changelog:
3.2.0

  • Integrated AusPost e-Parcel
  • Tested with WooCommerce 9.1
  • Made compatible with Multi-site

3.1.1

  • Fixed WooCommerce Cart/Checkout Blocks Excess Rates Request Issue.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.9

3.1.0

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.8
  • Tested with WordPress 6.5
  • Fixed Issues.
  • Australia Post Startrack Integration.

3.0.0

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.5
  • Implemented Packaging Algorithms.
  • Fixed Issues.
  • UI/UX Improvements.
  • Australia Post MyPost Business – Supports preferred payment method (Stored Payment/Credit Account)

2.0.1

  • Fixed shipment table creation issue.

2.0.0

  • Tested with WordPress 6.4
  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.3
  • DHL Express Integration.
  • Auto Generate Labels.
  • Generate Return Labels.
  • Upgrading to V2.0.0 includes significant technical improvements including the database architecture change aimed at providing a better user experience.
  • UI/UX Improvements.

1.1.0

  • Tested with WordPress 6.2
  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.9
  • Ability to add shipping address based conditional shipping rule based on regions and zipcodes
  • UI Changes
  • Fixed Issues
  • Incorporated MyPost Business International Changes

1.0.0

  • Initial Version
  • Integrated to Australia Post My Post Business
  • Realtime Shipping Rates & Print Label
  • Schedule pickup & Shipment Tracking
  • Bulk Shipment

short_description: WooCommerce Multi-Carrier Shipping Plugin for Rates, Shipping Labels, Pickup & Tracking. Supports Australia Post & DHL. Coming Soon: USPS, FedEx &UPS
